    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030102</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Otros monosacáridos</string>
            <string language="en">Other monosaccharides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andere Monosaccharide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'autres monosaccharides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outros monosaccharides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altri monosaccaridi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλα monosaccharides</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir qué es el ácido glucurónico, la glucosalina y el inositol, así como sus funciones biológicas.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover what glucuronic acid, glucosamine and inositol are, as well as their biological functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">monosacáridos</string>
            <string language="en">monosaccharides</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, welche Glucuron- Säure, Glukosamin und Inosit sind, sowie ihre 
biologischen Funktionen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir quels acide, glucosamine et inositol glucuroniques sont, 
aussi bien que leurs fonctions biologiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir que 
ácido, glucosamine e inositol glucuronic é, as.well.as suas 
funções biológicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che acido, 
glucosammina ed inositolo glucuronici è, così come le loro funzioni 
biologiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
ποια glucuronic οξύ, glucosamine και inositol είναι, καθώς
επίσης και οι βιολογικές λειτουργίες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monosaccharide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
